sqlMap.select: SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr AS count, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM temp_bibtex b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b.content_id = t.content_id, bibhash h WHERE ORDER BY b.rank

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr AS count, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM bibtex b, tas t, bibhash h, (SELECT t1.content_id FROM WHERE AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.group = #groupType# ORDER BY t1.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS tt WHERE b.content_id = tt.content_id AND t.content_id = tt.content_id AND ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr AS count, g.group, g.group_name FROM bibtex b, tas t, groupids g, bibhash h, (SELECT t1.content_id FROM WHERE
AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.user_name = #requestedUserName# ORDER BY t1.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS tt WHERE tt.content_id=b.content_id AND tt.content_id=t.content_id AND AND g.group = b.group ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr AS count, g.group, g.group_name FROM bibtex b, tas t, groupids g, bibhash h, (SELECT DISTINCT b.content_id FROM bibtex b, WHERE
AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.user_name = #userName# AND t1.content_id = b.content_id GROUP BY b.content_id ORDER BY t1.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS tt WHERE tt.content_id = b.content_id AND AND tt.content_id = t.content_id AND g.group = b.group
ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, (SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND b.user_name = f.user_name AND b.group = #groupType# ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset# ) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr AS count, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM (SELECT content_id, date FROM collector WHERE user_name = #userName#) AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON c.content_id = t.content_id, bibtex b, bibhash h WHERE b.content_id = c.content_id AND ORDER BY c.date DESC, content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, b.ctr as count, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM (SELECT b.*, h.ctr FROM bibtex b FORCE INDEX (group_date_content_id_idx), bibhash h WHERE `group` = #groupType# AND ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 15) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b.content_id=t.content_id ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr AS count, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM (SELECT b2.* FROM bibtex b2 WHERE simhash$requestedSimHash$ = #hash# AND `group` = #groupType# ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b.content_id = t.content_id, bibhash h WHERE ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC
SELECT ctr FROM bibhash WHERE hash = #hash# AND type = #simHash#
SELECT contendID FROM WHERE hash = #hash# AND type = #simHash#

SELECT g.*,b2.content_id,b2.date,t.tag_name,b2.user_name, b2.simhash1 AS interHash,b2.simhash2 AS intraHash,h.ctr AS count,b2.title, b2.address,b2.annote, b2.booktitle, b2.chapter, b2.crossref, b2.edition, b2.howpublished, b2.institution, b2.journal, b2.bkey, b2.month, b2.note, b2.number, b2.organization, b2.pages, b2.publisher, b2.school, b2.series, b2.type, b2.volume, b2.day, b2.url, b2.content_id, b2.description, b2.bibtexKey, b2.misc, b2.bibtexAbstract, b2.user_name, b2.date, b2.title, b2.author, b2.editor, b2.year, b2.entrytype FROM (SELECT * FROM bibtex b WHERE simhash$requestedSimHash$ = #hash#
AND user_name = #requestedUserName# ORDER BY date DESC) AS b2 LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b2.content_id = t.content_id LEFT OUTER JOIN document d ON (d.content_id = b2.content_id AND d.user_name = b2.user_name), bibhash h, groupids g WHERE AND b2.group = g.group ORDER BY b2.date DESC, b2.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, b.ctr AS count, b.interHash, b.intraHash, NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM (SELECT , h.ctr FROM bibtex b2, bibhash h, search s WHERE s.group = #groupType# AND MATCH (s.content) AGAINST (#search# IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND s.content_type = #contentType# AND AND b2.content_id = s.content_id
s.user_name = #requestedUserName#
ORDER BY s.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON t.content_id = b.content_id ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id

SELECT count(*) FROM search s WHERE s.group = #groupType# AND MATCH (s.content) AGAINST (#search# IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND s.content_type = #contentType#
s.user_name = #requestedUserName#

SELECT b.*, t.tag_name, b.ctr as count FROM (SELECT , b2.group, h.ctr, NULL AS group_name FROM bibtex b2, bibhash h WHERE b2.group = #groupType# AND ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON t.content_id = b.content_id ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, (SELECT b2.content_id, b2.date FROM () AS b1 JOIN bibtex b2 ON b1.simhash1 = b2.simhash1 AND b2.user_name = #requestedUserName#) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group
AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY b.simhash1 DESC, bb.date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM () AS duplicates

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr as count, g.group FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, ((SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, groups g WHERE g.group = #groupId# AND g.user_name = b.user_name
)UNION( SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, groups g, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = f.user_name AND b.user_name = f.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# AND b.group = $groupType$ )UNION( SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, groups g WHERE b.user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = b.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# ) ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM bibtex b, groups g WHERE g.group = #groupId# AND b.user_name = g.user_name

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr as count, g.group FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.*, b2.count FROM (SELECT b.*, h.ctr AS count FROM bibtex b, bibhash h WHERE AND b.user_name = #requestedUserName#
ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b2 LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON b2.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE b2.group = g.group ORDER BY b2.date DESC, b2.content_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM bibtex b WHERE b.user_name = #requestedUserName#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO bibtex (title, entrytype, author, editor, year, content_id, journal, volume, chapter, edition, month, bookTitle, howpublished, institution, organization, publisher, address, school, series, bibtexKey, `group`, date, user_name, url, description, annote, note, pages, bKey, number, crossref, misc, bibtexAbstract, type, day, scraperid, simhash0, simhash1, simhash2, simhash3) VALUES (#resource.title#, #resource.entrytype#, #resource.author#, #resource.editor#, #resource.year#, #requestedContentId#, #resource.journal#, #resource.volume#, #resource.chapter#, #resource.edition#, #resource.month#, #resource.booktitle#, #resource.howpublished#, #resource.institution#, #resource.organization#, #resource.publisher#, #resource.address#, #resource.school#, #resource.series#, #resource.bibtexKey#, #groupId#, #date#, #userName#, #resource.url#, #resource.description#, #resource.annote#, #resource.note#, #resource.pages#, #resource.BKey#, #resource.number#, #resource.crossref#, #resource.misc#, #resource.bibtexAbstract#, #resource.type#, #resource.day#, #resource.scraperId#, #resource.simHash0#, #resource.simHash1#, #resource.simHash2#, #resource.simHash3#)
INSERT INTO bibhash(hash, type, ctr) VALUES (#hash#, #requestedSimHash#, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ctr = ctr + 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE bibhash SET ctr = ctr - 1 WHERE hash = #hash# AND type = #requestedSimHash#
